Key Match Events: Canada took a 2-0 lead with goals from Ismaël Koné (22') and Jonathan David (80'). Uruguay responded with goals from Rodrigo Bentancur (8') and Luis Suárez (90'+2') to force extra time. The match ended 2-2 after 90 minutes and went to a penalty shootout.
Post-Match Reflections: Uruguay won the penalty shootout 4-3, securing third place in the 2024 Copa América.
Others: The match was played at the Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, North Carolina, with an attendance of 24,386.
